name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Monuments
description: If you like to make puzzles, Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Monuments is your game. Visit some of the most relevant monuments in the world enjoying its comfortable and intuitive interface and its relaxing music that will allow you to concentrate on the difficult task of solving these beautiful photos that pose a real challenge for lovers of...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7 Processor: Intel® Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Storage: 650 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7 Processor: Intel® Quad Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Storage: 650 MB available space
